TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Fawahan, title = Fawahan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fawahan} }

S.FORM: ===== Takaray a sowal ===== o fawahan hananay i, adihay ko imi nona tilid, o picomodan no marorayay a matayal masaromi'ad a tamdw a minokay, roma sa i ,o kahadakan a malingad no laloma'an. Ano awa ko fawahan i,awa ko picomodan no minokayay, awa ko pahiceraan no tamdaw, itini to a malaholhol ko laloma'an.

===== Takaray a sowal ===== o fawahan hananay i, adihay ko imi nona tilid, o picomodan no marorayay a matayal masaromi'ad a tamdw a minokay, roma sa i ,o kahadakan a malingad no laloma'an. Ano awa ko fawahan i,awa ko picomodan no minokayay, awa ko pahiceraan no tamdaw, itini to a malaholhol ko laloma'an.
